title: Chalmers Group of Companies Acquires LYNX Product Group
text:
Acquisition Enables Growth, Service Integration to Better Serve Customers

MISSISSAUGA, Ontario — Chalmers Group of Companies, a privately owned Canadian corporation that manufactures and supplies niche quality equipment to the medical and transportation industries, has announced the acquisition of LYNX Product Group, which designs, develops, and manufactures both standard and custom animal care washing, disinfection, filling, and conveying systems.

LYNX joins PRIMUS Sterilizer Company, Scientek Technology Group, and CSI Jewett as companies that are part of Chalmers Medical Group (CMG). With facilities solely in North America, CMG is a best-in-class manufacturer and services provider for healthcare and life sciences companies.

The acquisition of LYNX continues the company’s commitment to expanding its footprint to ensure proven solutions and quick turnaround to its customers throughout North America.

“By bringing these companies into CMG, we are providing our clients with a broader support network, deeper technical expertise, commonality among platforms, and a centralized source for parts and equipment,” said Jim Fry, president and CEO of CMG.

“By becoming part of Chalmers, we have a partner that has the same core philosophies and focus on quality and customer service,” said Don Basil, president of LYNX. “It also allows us to provide our customers a suite of complementary products in the markets we serve.”

The acquisition furthers the company’s mission to be the single solution for customers seeking steam sterilizers, washing equipment, refrigeration products, and ancillary stainless-steel equipment with non-proprietary parts.

“The synergies we’ve created through our acquisitions allow us to provide integrated solutions for research, production, and infection prevention,” said H.S. Takhar, CEO of the Chalmers Group. “Now one of the largest manufacturers of our kind in North America, we also offer customers superior service support to maximize uptime and ensure longevity of their equipment.”

About Chalmers Group of Companies

Chalmers Group is a privately owned corporation with subsidiaries in the U.S. and Canada, offering niche quality products to medical and transportation equipment industries since 1992. Chalmers Group of Companies has strong design and manufacturing capabilities that offers a wide range of diversified products to global markets.

About Lynx

Founded in 2001, LYNX Product Group serves the Life Sciences and Healthcare industries with the design, development, and manufacture of both standard and custom animal care washing, disinfection, filling and conveying systems.
